title: Rolling Stones 40 Licks + London Years (5CDs)
description:
40 Licks + The London Years: 5CDs worth of The Rolling Stones. Both are compilation albums and therefore excellent.

In my opinion (and I&#039;m a huge Stones fan), these are the two best possible compilations (let alone alumbs) to have of the Rolling Stones, as together they contain pretty much every one of the Stones&#039; greatest songs. The London Years was produced some time ago, and went platinum and 40 Licks was produced more recently and went quadruple platinum (in the USA alone).
